docs.snippet: Having fought her way to the top of British politics, new Prime Minister Theresa May will face an even tougher battle in power: plotting a divorce from the European Union that she once opposed but now says must not be halted....
docs.lead_paragraph: Having fought her way to the top of British politics, new Prime Minister Theresa May will face an even tougher battle in power: plotting a divorce from the European Union that she once opposed but now says must not be halted.

headline.main: After Winning Power, Theresa May Faces Brexit Divorce Battle
headline.print_headline: After Winning Power, Theresa May Faces Brexit Divorce Battle

docs.snippet: Support for the anti-immigrant Alternative for Germany (Afd) has fallen dramatically amid party infighting, racially-tinged criticism of Germany's popular national soccer team and even a local backlash over Britain's vote to leave the EU....
docs.lead_paragraph: Support for the anti-immigrant Alternative for Germany (Afd) has fallen dramatically amid party infighting, racially-tinged criticism of Germany's popular national soccer team and even a local backlash over Britain's vote to leave the EU.

headline.main: Germany's Far-Right AfD Implodes Over Brexit, Good for Merkel

docs.lead_paragraph: British recruiter PageGroup Plc saw a slowdown in the run-up to the country's June 23 referendum on leaving the European Union, its quarterly results showed on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: French President Francois Hollande will visit five EU countries later in July to promote the European Union project, his office said in statement on Monday....

docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama said on Saturday he expected Britain to go through with leaving the European Union after last month's referendum and was concerned to limit the damage to the British, European and global economies from the move....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama said on Saturday he expected Britain to go through with leaving the European Union after last month's referendum and was concerned to limit the damage to the British, European and global economies from the move.

headline.main: Obama Says Brexit Talks Must Not Harm 'Wobbly' World Economy
headline.print_headline: Obama Says Brexit Talks Must Not Harm 'Wobbly' World Economy

docs.snippet: European financial services commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis dismissed on Wednesday arguments that Italian banking is in crisis due to Britain's vote to leave the EU, weakening Rome's push to soften rules limiting state-funded bank rescues....
docs.lead_paragraph: European financial services commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis dismissed on Wednesday arguments that Italian banking is in crisis due to Britain's vote to leave the EU, weakening Rome's push to soften rules limiting state-funded bank rescues.

headline.main: Italian Banking Crisis Precedes Brexit, EU's Dombrovskis Says

docs.snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's cabinet agreed on Wednesday to stick to plans for a balanced budget over the next four years, Finance Minister Wolfgang Schaeuble said, holding course despite the shock of Britain's vote to leave the European Unio...
docs.lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel's cabinet agreed on Wednesday to stick to plans for a balanced budget over the next four years, Finance Minister Wolfgang Schaeuble said, holding course despite the shock of Britain's vote to leave the European Union.

headline.main: German Cabinet Backs Balanced Budget Continuity After Brexit Vote
headline.print_headline: German Cabinet Backs Balanced Budget Continuity After Brexit Vote

docs.snippet: The European Union says it will not be "paralyzed" after Britons voted to leave, but Brussels policymakers say uncertainty over Britain's future is already complicating the lawmaking process for the rest of the EU....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union says it will not be "paralyzed" after Britons voted to leave, but Brussels policymakers say uncertainty over Britain's future is already complicating the lawmaking process for the rest of the EU.

headline.main: In or Out? Brexit Limbo Gives EU Headache
